roleset.name: To remove or keep from active participation

role.descr: person preventing, removing arg1 from participation
sidelined from what? mention of activity arg1 can't participate in

example.name: Arg 1 only, passive
example.text: [Fresh buying interest]-1 was sidelined *-1 ahead of a potential market - affecting debate in the House of Commons set for Tuesday .
example.arg: ahead of a potential market - affecting debate in the House of Commons set for Tuesday .

example.name: All args
example.text: Babe Ruth's hot-dog-eating binges were so extreme, they sidelined him from games.

roleset.note: Roleset based on wsj-nw instances. Framed by Claire.
